text:
AliExpress and more: the most interesting finds of the day
07 Nov 2019, 09:01 by Anton Martynov

1. AliExpress

2. Tmall

3. "M. Video"

4. Asos

5. Book24

6. KupiVip.ru

7. Promotional codes and discounts




In today's issue - discounts on Xiaomi Mi 9T, Cubot Max 2, electronics, books and other products.
Sign up for the weekly newsletter and get the best finds from AliExpress. And on our Telegram ‚Äë channels ‚ÄúNakhodka‚Äù and ‚ÄúEverything for a Man‚Äù interesting products and selections await you.


AliExpress
On AliExpress, the preparation for the big sale on November 11th continues. Already now you can pick up the goods in the basket. For each product added to the basket, users receive 5 coins (up to 50 coins per day).
Until November 11, the user can collect a maximum of 700 coins, which must be used to receive discount coupons. You can also collect coupons on the page "Coupon Center". Products of popular brands with discounts and coupons are presented here.
You can also save on AliExpress using the Letyshops service. Users receive 5% cashback on mobile accessories, clothing, home decoration and garden supplies, as well as 1.5% on mobile phones, tablets and laptops, computer equipment, audio and video equipment, and external drives.
Xiaomi Mi 9T (‚àí14%)



Smartphone with 6.39-inch AMOLED-display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 730 processor, 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of flash memory. The main triple camera is equipped with 48 + 13 + 8 megapixel sensors, and a retractable front camera with 20 megapixels.
The 4000 mAh battery supports fast charging with up to 18 watts. This smartphone will pull most games at medium and high settings, useful for taking photos on social networks and watching videos.
Price: 22 522 ‚Üí 19 811 rubles.

Buy

Cubot Max 2 (‚àí15%)



The device with a 6.8 ‚Äë inch display, Helio P22 processor, 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB of ROM. The battery capacity is 5,000 mAh.
For shooting in Max 2 there is a main dual camera of 12 + 2 megapixels and a front camera of 8 megapixels. Suitable for surfing the Internet, watching videos on YouTube and chatting on social networks.

Buy

Tmall
At Tmall, a big sale will be held on November 11 and 12. In the online store, it will be possible to purchase smartphones and accessories, laptops and office equipment, televisions and audio systems, goods for gamers and household appliances at discounted prices. All attracted suggestions should be added to the basket now.
Brand4404 (‚àí25%)



A 750 W thermal pot holds 4 liters of water. It supports four temperature options - from 45 to 98 ¬∞ C. It is possible to set a delay timer for boiling up to 12 hours, and after 48 hours the thermal sweat is switched off automatically if not used.

Buy

Xiaomi Mi Body Composition Scale 2 (‚àí19%)



Smart scales can measure 13 indicators: total body weight, bone and muscle mass, body water level, percentage of adipose tissue, protein level, metabolism and other indicators. Able to determine the weight of vegetables, fruits and other items from 100 g.
They communicate with a smartphone on Android and iOS via Bluetooth 5.0, powered by four AAA batteries.

Buy



"M Video"
LG F2H6HS0E (‚àí23%)



A narrow washing machine with a maximum load of 7 kg is suitable for family use. It is equipped with a drum with a surface in the form of bubbles, which provides gentle care for products made from delicate materials. The maximum spin speed is 1,200 rpm.
The machine supports the ‚Äústeam wash‚Äù mode for cleaning of possible powder residues. Steam makes the fabric soft and pleasant to the touch. All settings of modes, time and temperature are performed using the touch panel.
Price: 30 990 ‚Üí 23 990 rubles.

Buy

Philips 43PUS6503 / 60 (‚àí27%)



The 43-inch UHD ‚Äë TV with HDR extended-range technology is equipped with a DVB ‚Äë T2 digital tuner, two USB ports, three HDMI, a Toslink optical output and an RCA input.
It supports SmartTV and can connect to the Internet through a LAN ‚Äë port or Wi ‚Äë Fi ‚Äë connection. There are two built-in speakers with a power of 10 watts each.

Buy

Book24
Transcend, Raymond Kurzweil and Terry Grossman (‚àí33%)




Nine steps on the path to eternal life.

If you decide to stay in this world for a long time, then in Transcend you will find practical tips on how to stay healthy and live up to new discoveries in the field of biotechnology.
The authors of the book studied a huge amount of medical research to convince readers that in the future it will be possible to slow down the aging process.
Price: 1 014 ‚Üí 679 rubles.

Buy

‚ÄúNo Stress‚Äù, Mithu of the Side (‚àí33%)




A scientific approach to dealing with depression, anxiety and burnout.

This practical book will help protect health and keep thinking clear, even in stressful situations. It discusses the main components of stress: inflammation, knocked down biorhythms, cortisol levels and emotional triggers.
Price: 910 ‚Üí 610 rubles.

Buy

The Way of the Jedi, Maxim Dorofeev (‚àí33%)




Search for your own productivity methodology.

This book describes an approach to conducting self-experimentation that will help you choose your own recipe for productivity.
The author gives the standard components of the productivity recipe in three categories: one-time actions with a long-term effect, repeated actions that save the result at the time of execution, as well as indicators characterizing certain aspects of success.
All of these components are distributed across five levels of Jedi maturity, or levels of Jedi pumping. To distribute all the techniques correctly, the author gathered the experience of many people.
Price: 800 ‚Üí 536 rubles.

Buy

Promotion codes and discounts
1. ‚ÄúGift Time‚Äù - when ordering an amount of 2 500 rubles or more, customers receive a gift of their choice.
2. Yves Rocher - discounts up to 35% on new cosmetics.

4. Erborian - when buying from 3,000 rubles, they give a discount of 1,000 rubles, from 6,000 rubles - a discount of 2,000 rubles, from 9,000 rubles - a discount of 3,000 rubles.
5. TomTop - 5% discount on smartphones using the PICODI5PHONE promo code.
